title: Discovery
description: I dive deep into understanding your business, goals, and technical requirements. This phase includes direct stakeholder consultations, architectural research, and mapping out the project core.

title: Strategy
description: I develop a comprehensive digital blueprint that outlines system architecture, feature prioritization, and high-performance technical patterns aligned with your growth objectives.

title: Design
description: I create high-fidelity technical mockups and design systems that balance aesthetic visual impact with clean engineering. I iterate rapidly based on your direct feedback.

title: Development
description: I build the core system using performance-optimized code and modern architecture. As a solo developer, I maintain absolute consistency across the entire codebase from frontend to DevOps.

title: QA & Hardening
description: I perform comprehensive automated and manual stress-testing across all devices. I optimize performance for P99 latency and validate strict security compliance.

title: Launch
description: I handle the full deployment to production, configure automated CI/CD pipelines, and set up real-time system monitoring. Total ownership of the release pipeline.

title: Post-LTS Support
description: I provide dedicated support including performance tuning, security patches, and data-driven updates to ensure your system remains modern and stable indefinitely.
